H0.text: what part of brain is responsible for complex thinking. The Parietal Lobe

H1.text: what part of brain is responsible for complex thinking. The Temporal Lobe

H2.text: what part of brain is responsible for complex thinking. The Basal Ganglia

H3.text: what part of brain is responsible for complex thinking. the frontal lobe

A4.text: The frontal lobe is the same part of the brain that is responsible for executive functions such as planning for the future, judgment, decision-making skills, attention span, and inhibition.

A5.text: The frontal lobe supports goal-directed behavior and abstract mental representations, such as the ability to imagine oneself in the future.
